Very Spacious 1 bedroom located in the Heart of Astoria! This building is perfectly located just steps off the vibrant Broadway Ave. close to all, bars, restaurants, supermarkets, gym, shops, parks, etc. Just a 6 minute walk to N/W Broadway stop. entry.content:
